results.content: If javascript has not made sense so far, it will start making after this course.  As for my personal experience I am grateful to David Katz for making the course the way it is. It's concise as well as informative. His content is well crafted and his knowledge on the subject is very clear. Once again, Thank You David Katz for this wonderful insight on  javascript.

results.content: Thank you! This was a nice course.

results.content:
Great course, good overview, passionate instructor.  The one thing I would have liked to see is more 'real-world' use cases and examples, basically, how to apply what was taught to every day coding.

Overall though, its a great course for the money!  I would buy it again.
results.content_html:

Overall though, its a great course for the money! I would buy it again.

results.content: Amazing Course! David is a great instructor.

results.content: I like the pace of the course and I think concepts are explained well and clear, good job.
results.content_html: I like the pace of the course and I think concepts are explained well and clear, good job.

results.content:
Else and switch was described very quickly. It was not clear what the difference was. They seem to do the same thing and he said it was
 “verbose” to use else statements. But switch statements seemed to be just as “verbose” or “long-winded” as else statements. Breaks seemed to be almost like a stopping point—as if JavaScript will read everything and evaluate  and gets handed off to the next statement until it sees a break. That was a little unclear too.
results.content_html:
Else and switch was described very quickly. It was not clear what the difference was. They seem to do the same thing and he said it was
“verbose” to use else statements. But switch statements seemed to be just as “verbose” or “long-winded” as else statements. Breaks seemed to be almost like a stopping point—as if JavaScript will read everything and evaluate and gets handed off to the next statement until it sees a break. That was a little unclear too.

results.content: This course is awful, I regret taking it.
